file_content.text: You are currently in the intermission between rounds. Would you like to continue or exit the competition?
[Continue] I'm ready to fight!
[Continue] Bring on the next round!
[Exit Competition] I've had enough fighting for today.
[Exit Competition] I've had enough fighting for today.
[Leave Conversation] I'm not sure, let me think about this first.
[Leave Conversation] I'm not sure, let me think about this first.
Prepare yourself to face the next arena combatant! Are you ready to proceed?
[Begin Round] Yes!
[Begin Next Round] Yes!
[Leave Conversation] I need a moment to prepare.
[Leave Conversation] I need a moment to prepare.
If you exit the competition now, you will only be rewarded for the rounds you have currently survived. Are you sure you wish to exit?
[Exit Competition] Yes.
[Exit Competition] Yes.
Wait, I'm not sure.
Wait, I'm not sure.
Would you like to continue or exit the competition?
Please return to the arena terminal in the cantina to claim your reward.
This terminal cannot be accessed outside of arena intermission.
[Scouting Report] Tell me about the next opponent.
[Scouting Report] Tell me about the next round.
Eternal Champion Zotar's current arena strategy is something of a mystery.
Arlaia Zayzen's Doom Droid is said to have an ability that can wipe out arena opponents instantly!
Ronum Minkus' Rancor Little Gut is a notorious terror in the arena.
No one has ever been able to take on both Nocturno and Drake Raven at once.
When the Breaktown Brawler and his pets decide to gang up on combatants, few if any survive. Splitting them up would be wise.
Vindicator Lanos is only as dangerous as the Reprogrammed Skytroopers he will call to fight alongside him throughout the round.
Conraad Om'wurt and his K'lor'slug Chompers are a tough package to take on. Both have been seen to become violently enraged when the other is defeated.
Gungus Boga has been known to get the arena fired up ... literally.
Daruula Grah is especially known for his toxic grenades and trained Iknayids. The Iknayids aren't so well trained that they won't get caught in the effect of Darrula's grenades however.
Prior combatants have found success by getting Daruula to target his pets, weakening them and leaving him open to attack.
When Gungus begins channeling his fire in the center of the area ... run! Also be sure to avoid the smaller fires afterward.
Common wisdom says to juggle attacks on both Conraad and Chompers until the K'lor'slug goes into his regeneration state, then concentrate on Conraad alone.
If Chompers calls in help however, deal with them quickly.
The only people to have success against Lanos so far have been those who learned when and how to interrupt the special attacks of his Reprogrammed Skytroopers.
These Skytroopers have been specifically augmented to perform devastating attacks as well as erect impenetrable defenses.
Only those who properly coordinate with their companion, knowing when to stand and when to move, have ever stood a chance.
There are whispers however that he has been asking around in order to determine if the arena entry is big enough to allow a Zakuul Walker.
Tackle one while finding a way to keep the other off your back and watch out for your companion. These two have been known to pull some dirty tricks in the past.
When this pulse begins charging one would be smart to destroy whatever is powering it before it's complete.
Be sure to watch out for Gungus' Herald of Zildrog followers too as they have been known to overwhelm opponents in the past.
You have been defeated, but defeat in the Arena Grand doesn't mean you're out of the fight.
Use this terminal to check the [Scouting Report] for hints on defeating your opponent and then choose to [Continue] in order to attempt the current round again.
[Scouting Report] Tell me about my opponent.
You'll need to take out Arlaia Zayzen's droids first, otherwise you'll never be able to defeat her.
Defeat the Combat Unit first, then the Medical Unit, then Arlaia herself.
Are you ready for more?
[Continue] I'm ready to try again!
[Continue] Bring on the next round!
Prepare yourself to face your opponent! Are you ready to proceed?
Mayhem at the Arena Grand will begin momentarily.
